QuestData.Title: The Burlap Trail: To Kota Basecamp
QuestData.Description: This here's hozen lands. Very dangerous. But grummles must trek through. Supplies must reach the Serpent's Spine.$b$bGo, protect the next wave of grummles on their trek to Kota Basecamp.$b$bIf at least one survives, good fortune will find its way to you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect a group of grummles from the Burlap Waystation to the Kota Basecamp. At least one grummle must survive.$b$bIf you lose your grummles, you can search the Burlap Trial or return to the Burlap Waystation and wait for the next group to leave.
QuestData.RewardText: Ha ha! Hero of grummles! Welcome to Kota Basecamp. Enjoy good fortune for most happy grummle delivery.
